properties.title: Concierge OSGi - An optimized OSGi R3 implementation for mobile and embedded systems - Concierge on Mi|k|a
properties.author: Jan S. Rellermeyer

meta.name: description
meta.content: Concierge is an optimized OSGi R3 implementation with a minimal file and memory footprint, which makes it ideal for small and embedded devices.

section.name: Concierge on Devices with Mika VM

img.alt: Concierge on Mika on Linksys Router

section.p: We are testing Concierge on a variety of devices with /k/ Embedded Mi|k|a VM. One nice example was the Linksys WRT54GS that was used for the talk at EclipseCon 07. It was running Concierge on Mika on the OpenWRT firmware.
